content.detailedDescription:
From 6:59 to 7:25pm on march 17th, 2009, my sons and i saw another ufo in the skies over long beach, california. we were in the backyard of our home taking pictures of whatever might look interesting, as sky-watching is our hobby. we do it at least 5 days a week to relax after a long day and i've been teaching them the constellations. i then noticed something that didn't fit what we've come to know as a terrestrial craft, whether a jet, prop or experimental aircraft. there was an object that was going from the west to the east and there was no red light visible (faa reg) as with all other aircraft taking off from the airport. then it started to hover and immediately changed direction and again... did not have the faa green light on its opposite side. 
i have almost 60 photos of this sighting... you really must see them all to be able to appreciate what is going on here.
from my vantage point of about a mile off of the pacific coast, this craft was hovering on the southern horizon - probably above the electric company at the corner of studebaker and 2nd street/westminster. after hovering, the craft would then make 160-180 degree turns going east, then west, then repeating while slowly drifting further south - over the pacific ocean - towards the famed "redondo trench". this went on, as can be seen in the properties of my photos, for 26 full minutes.
at the time of our sighting this time, it was not clear what shape the object actually was until the photos were analyzed upon download to my computer, and even then, it seemed only the lights were visible. as far as structure and the apparent "shape-shifting abilities", this was one spectacular sighting! however it didn't beat the triangle "mothership" we all saw last november 12th, and i don't think anything else could! that was reported the same day on ufo northwest, if you are interested. 
anyway, i took a few "real-time" photos of the craft, but didn't want to "waste" the pictures and knew the only way to be sure to "get proof" was to take timed shots, so - as a result - most of the almost 60 photos i shot were 8 second exposures at a f 2.5 setting with an exposure value at +2.00 (the highest my camera goes) and certainly showing the true colors of the crafts lights and its flight pattern/path. i used a high-pixel, sony cybershot digital camera and did not alter the originals at all! i have kept their integrity to help you to prove or disprove whatever it was that caused more than ten helicopters to be in the air after it disappeared, and caused them to refuel and return to the search for the next 2 hours or so. the light appeared to be of whitish/yellow color with a bit of red from time to time, and what got my attention was that the lights and colors did not match the faa regulations with regards to red on the left and green on the right and white lights that blink 40x per minute. this thing pulsed and then stayed lit. then it blinked white lights fast and then went back to pulsing again only to follow it with another blast of bright, solid light for another thirty to sixty seconds. from where i was, it looked like a saucer, then looked like 2 doing maneuvers together. then it looked like two orbs that were connected somehow, then "shape-shifting" into something else... more square-round. 
i would also like to mention that based on the photos i have taken, i have reason to believe their may have been more than one craft in the sky last night, too. several shots seem to show what could be mistaken for stars, but upon closer inspection, can be seen to have the same color coding/ shading as the inital craft and in two of my photos, it looks as if their are 2 saucers of another shape that might even be a couple of boomerangs, but on a timed photo, it is hard to tell. you are the experts and i do hope that my final disclosure to you will help figure out what is happening on our planet!
well, this was absolutely incredible, but did not come close to others i and my family have had and would like to talk with an investigator about.
last night, there were a total of 7 of us and an 8th joined in at the last minute, that witnessed this sighting and the after-effects. only three of us saw it for the first 20 minutes or so, because i was getting pictures while the boys watched and tried to get neighbors out to see it, too. 
what else is interesting is that on march 11th, 2009, there was little to no usual traffic going into or out of long beach airport and around 8:18pm, seven military and police/civilian helicopters flew over our house, seeming to be looking for something on the ground. they flew rather slowly, from west to east and then took a more southerly direction when above seal beach, moving towards the huntington beach area. 
scary thing? i took photos of them, too as soon as i heard them coming and watched them go... and the first shot set off the flash which seemingly caused one of the helicopters to turn on and shine a searchlight on us! i had the kids shut off the lights in and outside of the house, got to my computer and downloaded them as soon as i could - just in case i got something i wasn't supposed to have!
i would most certainly like to speak with an investigator, especially since i've had multiple sightings (as has my eldest son) over the last many years and would like to finally share some of them with anyone willing to listen. i am beginning to fear whatever the heck is going on... and there is something going on. especially here in long beach, california.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Boomerang,  Circle,  Cylinder,  Disc,  Saturn-like,  Sphere,  Square,  Rectagular,  Other
content.summary: Long beach ca ufo hotspot.

content.detailedDescription: I looked out of my front window about 9:30 pm i saw a bright light come toward me tree level. i thought it was a helicopter, it was not. it was very bright then turned to the right at roof top level. it was a silver and white with a red bottom. later i looked out my back thinking the should be coming there later. there it was, it shot up and turned into a bright blue light twice and vanished.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: I saw one bright light come to me, then swittched to the left fast revolving white and silver, then behind out house later i saw two.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in the backyard when i saw what first appeared to be a plane coming from over the treetops about 1-1/2 miles away.  i'd never seen a plane come so low from that direction before and it seemed a bit strange looking because there weren't any navigation lights.  i assumed i was at an angle where i couldn't see the navigation lights, but just the headlights.  the light was white and bright and i could see no structure.  i lived next to dullus airport for 20 years in va so i knew that this was a little strange to start.  as i continued observing i decided to get my father out there.  by that time the light had already moved above the house as it moved in one direction the whole time.  as it passed over we never saw any navigation lights, it was just a silent slow moving light about the size of a passenger plane though just a ball of light.  we watched it continue forward in the same direction headed towards normandy lake from ovoka where i live.  it moved sw-ne over hunters point towards normandy lake.  there is an airforce base nearby (arnold air force base), whether this was some test or not i couldn't tell you, but it was definatly strange.  did anyone else see this or anything similar around coffee county?  jryan.Daniel@gmail.Com
content.summary: Righ after sunset my father and i witnessed a light about 1000 ft up slowly move across the sky and over our house.

content.detailedDescription: the blizzard of 93 was supposed to start as rain and then we were to get a couple inches of snow. i love the snow so i couldn't sleep well.I live in a very secluded area, my nearest neighbor is a quarter mile away. i woke up about 5 and looked outside. the snow was just starting, nothing on the ground yet. the snow flakes were the size of tennis balls and it wasn't that cold yet, maybe 34 and the wind wasn't blowing.When the snow started, it fluxuated, hard one minute and the next nothing. i stepped outside to stand on my deck to see the snow starting to fall. no noise but i looked at the tree line beside my house and there it was.It was long and it was round in the front. the back of it was wider than the rest of the ship. there were no lights. it was just floating along the road. not much faster than a walking speed.It was about 300' off of the ground and about 500'from me. it appeared to be about 200' long. it was big! i work surveying so i'm pretty good with distances. i freaked out and ran back inside to get my wife to come and see it but she wouldn't wake up.I screamed for her to get up and come see this thing, but she never moved. i returned to the deck, by this time it was gone. i watched the ship, and it was a ship, about 2 or 3 minutes before i went in to get my wife. thats how slow it was floating by.The sky was full of low clouds but this thing was below the cloud cover.It was no cloud, of that i'm sure. i'll never forget the blizzard of 93' for more than one reason.My neighbor, who has died since, used to tell me, the "flying sausers" were landing in a clearing behind my house, past the woods. i kind of made fun of him back then, i don't anymore.Not since i've seen one up close.
content.summary: The blizzard of 93' was starting and an object floated by my house.

content.detailedDescription: It was unreal a bright star lite thing flys aross the sky a great speed it went from one side of sky to the other in about 45 sec!!! thanks
content.summary: A starlike thing went across the sky at about 1500 ft.

content.detailedDescription: Last night was crystal clear, no wind and about 45 degrees. as always i went for a walk (left house at 9:45pm)through my neighborhood,which normally takes me twenty minutes. at 10:00pm i started hearing a noise that reminded me of a large diesel generator. now my neighborhood does not have any streetlights and there was only the occasional driveway light on. i stopped to get better idea as to what the sound came from as it started to get louder. as on cue all the dogs in the neighborhood went nuts. then i saw the blinking lights through the trees. first i thought it was a commercial airliner because its underside was illuminated and it had three blinking white strobe lights and one red one in the center. but the closer the plane got the more unusual things started to look. first of there was a chase plane and i assume based on wing profile that it was an f-18 following at an extremely close distance. (my elevation is 3200ft. and i would guess the objects to be at about 6-7000ft). the plane followed at between 100 to 300 yards mostly directly behind and sometimes slightly to the right as they were passing me from left to right pretty much right above me. the f-18 had two white strobes, one on each wingtip, otherwise no illumination. the "thing" it was following was some thing different all together. it was triangular in shape yet somewhat blurry. i could not see clean edges. it was about twice the size of the chase plane. the whole underside was illuminated by a cream colored warm light. there was one bright light at each corner that also acted as a strobe light but only visible from below. there was one red strobe in the center of the craft. airspeed was that of a single engine prop plane which is the only type to fly this low around here. any type of jet traffic is usually in the 30 000ft range except for the occasional fighter from beale afb and they only fly during the day. as they flew right above me the diesel sound(a pulsed rumble) was the loudest, the dogs still barking like mad. i could clearly see the outline of the chase plane against the starlit sky but the outline of the triangle remained blurred. as they past i could finally hear the sound of the jet engines from the f-18 even though at very low throttle. i wondered what the stall speed of an f-18 is because they were flying so slow, but i never heard the engine pitch change as long as i could see them. the sound from the lead object also never changed but was still audible long after they were out of sight. the dogs went quiet as soon as i could no longer hear them, which surprised me a bit since dogs generally hear much better then us. but from start to the end they seemed to hear what and when i heard it. the only other time that i have unusual things in the night sky is with my gen.Ii night vision goggles but that is a different story all together. one last thing. with out checking by compass, i estimate that they were flying south maybe south/west.
content.summary: Triangular shaped craft emitting low rumbling sound followed closely by an f18.

content.detailedDescription:
I, including my brother and his girlfriend, witnessed a strange moving light in the night sky in
mebane, north carolina (about 12 miles west of chapel hill). 
it happened friday june 6 2008. it happened approx. 11pm.

i was talking with my brother on my back deck (his girlfriend was talking to her parents on a cell, but witnessed the event as well) 
and we were also looking at the western sky, enjoying the clear night, when i noticed an unusually bright, 
white, large stationary star just under the spoon of the big dipper. i thought it a little strange because
i didn't think, from my limited knowledge of constellations, there was a large star under the big dipper.

i looked down briefly, and my brother said, "wow, i think it's moving...That's not a star.",
sure enough it did, and it traveled in an north easterly direction at a smooth, quick pace (much faster than you would see a high altitude jet). 
whatever it was seemed to me to be at very high altitude. 
i noticed it didn't have a trail like a meteorite does (and meteorites are much faster).
i was also looking to see if it had tail lights or blinking lights, and i saw none. there was no sound.

it traveled for a distance heading in the same north east direction, and it seemed to shrink into an red/amber light about half as bright and size...
at that time, i knew for sure it was something very unusual, when it did that it startled us.
it then abruptly turned in the opposite direction, traveled again for a short distance, then remained 
stationary for a few seconds, then seemed to zip out of sight like it was traveling upwards at a high rate of speed. the whole encounter was about approximately 5 minutes in duration. unfortunately it happened so fast, and i was so captivated, i didn't even think about getting my camera.
content.summary: Strangely moving bright ball of light in central north carolina night sky.

content.detailedDescription: I am reluctant to report this additional sighting as just reported a separrate sighting a few days ago. my wife convinced me that i must. sure enough, last night at approx. 8:30 pm, march 17th 2009, i stood up in the back yard of the house we were visiting and faced east. from my chair a few minutes earlier, i had noticed the star sirius blazing away in the dark night sky. left of sirius there was an aircraft flying very low with abnormally consistant bright red lights on what looked to be the tail end and front end of the vehicle. one strobe flashed in the center. i dismissed that particular set of lights because for some reason the planes in thei are don't have to conform to any fcc rules as their lights are "just whatever color" and placed without regulation on "just wherever" on the plane. that's another story...So, after viewing this aircraft and sirius for a short time, i noticed that the craft did move east over the mountains and was approx. at 6000ft alt. when it disappeared from view. a moment later, i stood up and stretched and glanced over to sirius again. i saw three very bright but distant lights light up in horizontal form relative to one another. the lights was whitish-orange and had a large "body" to them. i would go so far as to say they were spherical orbs emiting copious amoutns of light. the three lights lit up one at a time and i don't remember the order. the middle light seemed to be on first. after only a few seconds, the right light faded out, then the left, then the middle. my best guess on altitude would be 10,000ft. i would also guess they were attached to a single object because of the uniform distance from each other and perfect alignment. the total duration from my perspective was approx. 10 seconds. i watched the sky for over an hour afterwards and did not see them return.
content.summary: Series of three very bright lights, varying intensity, lit up then faded out over the mountains.

content.detailedDescription:
I don't know if this is worth reporting but on mar. 15, 2009,while returning home from a local restaurant, i saw a golden orange light east of breckenridge, tx at about 8:00: p.M.  i saw it long enough to realize it wasn't a plane or helicopter.  the light was moving north and over hwy 180 (maybe a mile from my location).  the light was lower than the path taken by planes landing and taking off at the local air field and much larger than the average landing light on a fixed wing aircraft.  my farm (and residence) is nne of the local airport, by less than 2 miles.  
the light appeared to cross hwy 180 on a south to north heading, and then disappeared.
i then left town heading south on hwy 183.   i was about 8-10 miles ne of cisco when i again saw what appeared to be the same golden orange light, only this time it was to my wsw and it was pacing my car. there was no discernible shape, just the bright light.  as i neared cisco the light winked out and was gone.  it paced my car for at least 6 miles.  the light was 500 to 800 feet agl and approx. 1/4 mile from my car.  i came to this conclusion by observing the lights of town in comparison of the moving light.  


then tonight, march 17, 2009, at 8:15 p.M., i had again left breckenridge on 183, headed to cisco.  i had just topped 5 mile hill.  to my south was a bright light, which i first assumed was the star sirius.  it was still dusk and i thought that it was odd how bright sirius appeared to be, when it was still fairly light outside, plus the light seemed to pulse 3 or 4 times, then flash brightly, in that order, continuously.   suddenly the star began to ascend and become brighter and appeared to be moving somewhat east but i figured that due to the bends in the road, maybe it just appeared to be to moving east.
i traveled south and as i reached the rest stop between breckenridge and cisco, i again saw the light and it was definitely due east now and approx. 1000 feet agl.  i knew then that it wasn't a star, it was that odd golden orange color.  the light had also taken on an elongated shape and if i held a large grain of rice between thumb and finger at arms length, that would almost cover the object.
as i kept glancing at this golden object, another object appeared slightly behind and above the first object, both the same size, so that it looked like 2 large glowing grains of rice, side by side. i passed a pickup on the side of the road and the driver seemed to be looking at the lights. i started reaching for my camera and began slowing down to stop and take a photo but as soon as tapped the brakes and released the cruise control, the object(s) rapidly dimmed and disappeared.  when the lights disappeared, they were approximately 40 degrees north and east of the cutoff to eastland (hwy 112).  total viewing time for second sighting was about just about 8 minutes.

1. i was driving when i saw the light(s).
2. the light was directly in front of me, i couldn't miss it.
3. i first thought it was a star.
4. it was a bright, golden orange colored light that was moving towards me then off to my left.  i could not determine speed but i would say it was close to cruising speed of a small single engine prop airplane.  then 1 became 2.
5. had no specific emotions at the time of sighting.
6. object(s) dimmed to nothing, disappeared.

i am enclosing a digital art depiction of how the lights of the second sighting appeared.
content.summary: 2 sightings of golden orange lights and an elongated shaped craft.

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I and my son saw 2 lights in the west of san antonio, this was 8:30pm, and i had just put my son to bed.I came out for a smoke and their were two bright lights in the west. dancing all over the western sky and as the one on the right did figure 8's slowly the left just sat and strobed gold and white. then the right  discs started circling and spliting into what came to 4 pieces all heading toward san antonio. i was beside myself. called a few friends all of which thought me mad, and thus contained the story. it was then i sat on the front porch and they played teasingly on the horizon the morning before i knew the truth.

p.S. i tried the cell, and camm, and everything was dead.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 2 discs, broke into 6 strobing whitelight, alternating red and blue.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to an appointment, and had just turned onto northbound wadsworth blvd from center ave, in the belmar area of lakewood.  a second or two after making the turn, i noticed this white "line" (could have been cylinder, cigar, disc or almost any shape) moving fairly quickly from left to right (west to east) well ahead of me - i estimate at least a few miles, maybe several miles (could have been over wheat ridge or arvada...).  as it got further east, the white color dimmed to a gray color, probably from going underneath the shade of a cloud (just a good guess).  it was difficult to keep a really good eye on it as i was in rather heavy traffic, which was slowing down as i approached alameda ave., so i had to also keep a good eye on the traffic.  i lost sight of it as it went out of view (an office building on the ne corner of wadsworth & alameda blocked my view).  once the traffic had moved forward enough, past alameda ave, i looked for it again, but could not see it, and had to continue to be careful driving.  it might have still been there, but harder to see perhaps because it closely matched the color of background clouds?  it also would have been getting farther away (farther to the east).  i did not have a camera with me, and even if i had had one, i wouldn't have had time to turn it on, aim it and snap pictures while driving in heavy traffic - would have been very unsafe, also.  however, i went back to that stretch of wadsworth blvd and took 4 pictures, approximating what my views were as i was driving this morning. i then used software to draw in what it looked like to me.  i will upload the pictures in the sequence of the viewing; you will be able to see it as a white, angled line, west of wadsworth and roughly above a bank building on the left side of the street, past alameda ave.  the 3rd and 4th pictures show how it dimmed to gray as it moved farther east.  i was on the phone with a friend this afternoon and told him about it.  he asked me if it could have been an airplane banking in a turn.  no, it could not have been that; if it had been that, it would have not appeared to move relative to my position, as it would more or less be flying away or toward me, not moving to my right (east), and it maintained this "tilt" throughout is movement eastward.  if it was an airplane, then this would mean that the nose of the plane was inclined about 45 degrees, the nose pointing up and the tail pointing down.  when a plane is landing at an airport, the nose is slightly raised so that the rear landing gear touch down, then the nose lowers and the forward gear touch down.  this was a much greater angle.  if it was a plane, then something must have been very wrong and the passengers would have been very uncomfortable, to say the least.  so, no, i don't believe it was an airplane.  if it wasn't an airplane, what was it???  my mufon id is 10646.  i have been a member since 2005.  i could only upload 3 pictures.  i have the 4th if anyone is interested.  keep in mind these are illustrations, not actual photos of the object, but i am pleased with the result.  this is what i saw.
content.summary: Tilted looking object moving from west to east.

content.detailedDescription: While going outside on my break. i was looking up at the clear starry night. when looking to the north i had seen a bright high flying object. that was slowly dimming and moving in a north by north west direction. the object was flying higher then any passenger plane in the area flies. the object had faded out to a reddish brown pin point then to nothing i could see with the nacket eye. this object did not have any airplane strobe lights on it. and judging speed and altitude it was at lease 60,000 ft high in the sky if not more.
content.summary: Very high flying object.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the night sky when i saw what i thought was a satellite traversing the dusk sky from north to south. it was a bright white light with no strobing affects. after watching it travel to my zenith position at a 45 degree angle, i began to watch it with my binoculars. it was heading due south with all the appearance of a satellite when at 40 degrees from the southerly horizon it suddenly stopped and reversed it's direction without ever changing velocity. i was freeking out because i knew that what i had just witnessed was totally impossible. it returned over the exact path that it had traveled till it slowed and faded out at true westerly position @ 45 degrees from my view point. i did not see it anymore past that point. i have seen many strange things recently, but this is one is the most bizarre. i am still perplexed about this!
content.summary: Single bright light @ 400 mph +/- suddenly reversed direction.

content.detailedDescription: Looking at deodar cedar tree in my backyard and noticed 2 dull-white spherical objects in the sky above at approximately 800 to 1000 ft. in the air. at first they looked like balloons. they were both the same size from what i could see. the objects appeared to be making a lazy circle and completed several rotations without any apparent patterns. as i watched them, one dipped out of view behind our tree and i lost sight of it. the other was still making an arc, and i believed it was a large balloon, floating upward on a thermal. it was a warm day and almost no clouds visible. then, i observed the sphere suddenly change direction, as if a very strong wind had grabbed it and the object flew over my house, still at a fairly high altitude. i had to run out of the backyard and into my front yard to keep it in view. hoping to get a better look at it, i watched it very closely. suddenly it changed direction again and flew a straight course at an incredible rate of speed. i would estimate 300-400mph to the west! on a perfectly straight line into the prevailing wind. i watched it for about another 10-20 seconds as it disappeared heading west toward the general direction of firebaugh and the coastal mountains. it was clear to me that it was under some kind of guidance and propulsion. there was absolutely no audible sound from the sphere. it was a strange-looking dull white without any visible lights, almost as though it was illuminated, but in broad daylight and full sun. it was like it became aware of my gazing at it and reacted by zooming off! it was a weird feeling. i watched the sky for at least another 30 minutes and did not observe anything further. i am attracted to weather, take a lot of photographs of clouds and the sky. have seen many balloons in the air at distances, but never seen an object like this one.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: White spheres above central fresno, ca.

content.detailedDescription: This is a event that i reported before this time i'm able to include the pictures i took from my cell phone
content.summary: Bright light low to ground with smaller light emitting from bottom.

content.detailedDescription: I was getting home from a walk with my father. i looked up to the sky like i normaly do to see if anything "funny" was going on in the sky. i am a firm beliver in ufos and always try to keep an eye to the sky. well anyway i thought it was a star, but no, it was was moving. my dad said it might of been an airplane but the light was bright enough if would of made a sound being that low, there was also no blinking light like most planes have. so to compare it was about a little brighter then venus in the night sky and had moved across the sky in an exact arc and slowly dimmed out into the horizon. i also looked on nasa, there were a couple iss passings but according to the degrees and elevation listed it was alot lower then where the object was i saw and it was also too bright because the iss was about 800 miles north. so without a doubt i belive that this object was not from the earth.
content.summary: Bright star-like object moving across sky at constant speed.

content.detailedDescription: Me and 2 of my friends were sitting on a bench in front of my tattoo shop on wrightsboro rd having a conversation about rc cars. one of my friends also works for me here at the shop. last week he told a few of us at the shop that he had seen some orange/yellow lights in the sky last tuesday night. we laughed it off as a plane or shooting star. as we were talking tonight he yelled out "look! look in the sky over there, there it is, the lights i saw last week"! me and my other friend looked up at the sky to find the "lights". it took 1-2 seconds and we saw them. 5 clustered orange/yellowish lights were lite up for 5-7 seconds. then thy dimmed out, not fast but not slow. at first i thought it was fireworks but they didn't dim out like fireworks do nor were they falling. they stayed in the same spot for around 8-10 seconds total. about 10 seconds after they were gone they appeared again in the sky but a lot father away than first time? they were only lit for a few seconds that time. we tried to explain it to each other and figure out what it was but can not come to a logical explanation as to what it could have been. my friend called the news station the first time it happened and was told they would look into it. nothing came of it. i told him to call them again and tell them we all saw the lights tonight. they told him that they had several other calls about the same lights we saw tonight and that they would be coming to interview us tomorrow. both times that the lights were seen were on tuesdays at or around 8pm. the light looked like they were around 10-15 miles away from us.
content.summary: 5 orange and yellow lights stationary in the western sky, random pattern, lite up for 5-7 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: While doing a little night riding on my atv down a local dirt road, i along with my passenger (a family member) noticed 2 fireball like lights above the tree tops less than 1 mile away. we where able to see these objects in the clearing we had entered. we immediately stopped and begin watching the 2 stationary lights. the lights seemed to glow slightly red and orange. they then faded out one after the other at the same rate of speed. i can assure you, being former usaf crash rescue, they were not aircraft,flares, or any other normal objects. nether of us were surprised about seeing the objects, we have witnessed a number of different unknown objects separately.
content.summary: 2 stationary glowing fireballs 200 feet above treetops faded out one after the other. not aircraft or flares.

content.detailedDescription:
Who would i call if every year i see these weird lights in the sky.It's different colors and is always in the same spot. (this only occurs one day in july)(and i'm not sure which day it was) and its weird because its in a direction of a airport. but around the area where i live. they are going to build house's but the construction workers discovered a bomb underground that never went off. the whole project stopped for about 3 week and no one every heard of why the bomb was there. just the military took it and didn't say nothing. is there a web site where i can see if the area i live in was a war zone or a bomb test site??

now about my story... i was outside playing football and it was around 8:00 o'clock pm. i got thirsty and decided to get a drink. it only took about 2 min to get it. i came back outside and saw this small object in the air just staying still. i stared at it for awhile then started to see it move. once it started moving i knew it wasn't me just seeing things. i called my dad and got the camera. i took some pictures and a video of this weird object. once i did that the object started moving back and forward. we both knew it wasn't a plane. (we live near a airport and can see the plane getting ready for landing). the object was in that same spot for about 23 25 min. we sat down and started to observe this mysteries object. the object stopped moving and lights we just moving around it in a disc way. at that time the lights stopped and the space craft jumped across the sky and we never saw it again.

as i have said i have seen this object in july ever year and i am not certain which day it was on. i can give a guess and i think it was 11th-19th. i told myself it was fake and it was just maybe a plane or something. but i believe it and i would like some help to figure out what it is. if anyone can help msg me at (maximboy07@hotmail.Com) 
i really want to find out what this object is thnx for reading ;]
content.summary: Object staying still in the air, until we took a picture then started moving.

content.detailedDescription: Driving eastward in the laguna hills/laguna niguel area, my wife and i viewed a very bright star-like object directly above the saddleback mountains (southern part of the santa ana mountain range in south orange county) - object was viewed in the dim morning light after sunrise (7.40am). it seemed as if the object was moving very slowly upwards as it stayed within our perspective; it did not appear to radiate any color other than a very bright white light. at first, i assumed the object may be a plane approaching for john wayne airport, but the light appeared too bright and constant... usually main airplane lights fluctuate with perspective and are certainly not as intense. after viewing for over 1 minute, the object then appeared to rapidly 'flicker' away and vanish completely while in full view. there were no clouds and air quality was good. also, our view was not obscured throughout. i made a good attempt to see if the object was still visible in some way, but nothing was visible in any way that i could identify. the sun was rising from behind the mountains and this made for a reasonably well-lit viewing, but the object did not appear to be reflecting light - it appeared to be emanating it's own star-like light of exceptional intensity. airplanes do approach south orange county from the saddleback area, but their movements are frequent and familiar and can usually be tracked with the eye - even with changing perspectives. some airplane light usually remains visible on approach - regardless of the viewing perspective. i'm not sure if john wayne has incoming flights at this time in the morning - i believe they do not.
content.summary: Star-like object viewed over saddleback mountains, orange county,  southern calif.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dogs and looked directly west torwards boulder and saw a weird shape in the sky. thought it was a cloud but it began to get more refined and darker. it was huge in scope due to the distance above the mountains in the sky.At exactly 5:55 it was a sloid shape and clear to the eye. it changed in color from a light tan to almost black. then as time passed around 10 min.- it was just like smoke in the cloud.I took around 15 pictures and these are a sample. a perfect rectangle in the sky but not of a solid material/not saying its a ufo. has anyone seen anything like this?
content.summary: Not sure what this is.

content.detailedDescription:
Note 1: eye witness reported sighting to me..

on monday march 16th approximated 8:20pm, while letting his dogs out and wanting to observe the space shuttle and iss fly-over, the witness spotted a dark gray-ish triangular object silently flying over-head.
1. color: dark gray-ish
2. shape: triangular in shape
3. structure: solid yet "erie" transparent with slight shimmering edges.
4. sound: no sound was emitted.
5. heading of object: south/west towards north/east
6. location of sighting: colorado springs at austin bluffs and academy
7. lights: none observed
8. observation: roughly 30 seconds
9. flight pattern: straight, steady velocity no swerving.
10. size: at arms length, roughly palm sized, 3 to 4 inches in diameter.
11. feelings: anxiety, nervous, amazed
note 2: local authorities were called, no other reported witnesses.
note 3: witness was not under any current medication or alcohol.

witness contacted me and i'm requesting mufon assign case to me to complete. i will contact airport tower and other local authorities requesting if any other sightings were submitted. witness will draw a picture of what he saw and email it to me.

chuck zukowski
mufon star investigator ;-)
mufon field investigator 
colorado springs, co
719-213-4250
content.summary: Observed flying triangle traveling sw to ne.

content.detailedDescription:
The weather has been bad so we havent gotten many chances lately. i have a point to make also. i have notice that when i report and incident here on the site, the jets will be out in droves. so when the jets come, the object will no longer fly around. i dont know where to begin.

i saw a woman on utube being interview about a ufo that she had see in arkansas and she had some pictures of it. i saw the same thing from about 100yrds away  on my way to work. it was about 5:40 am. hwy 7 entering camden, ar. from the south. the object apporached fast from the west on 376. it had red and green light so i took it to be a  small single engine plane because there is a small air port near by. next it then did a 90 degree turn above the traffic light there it kinda tilted over ... really slowly....Now i could see under it... this is when i saw that it also had  a bright white light at the front and the back of the opject. the white lights was just above  a red  then a seperate green light. these lights were the identical color as the traffic signal. there was 1 bright white light at the front and the back seem to be more like a spot light, lighting up the area around it.  i took it for a a large military copter then, but it wasnt making enough sound for me to hear it. it then went directly north up the street as if it was following the traffic lights. the object was less then 10 feet frome the traffic lights. then it took off and was far in the horizon in a matter 30 seconds. a co worker also saw it.

also in feb i saw a   star-like ufo. this one was out on a very cloudy night just after dark. u could not see a star in the sky because of the cloud cover. but u  could see it very well moving slowly across the sky.   

another night in feb i was cooking in the back yard and a starlike come by.. this time i had my high power flash light handy and and shinned it on the object. at first it flickerd  a lil... scared. i shinned the light back on the object.. this time it dimmed totally out.

another night my wife calls and tell me to go out  and see if i can get a  glimps of 3 very bright lights in the sky. she is about 4 mins away from the  house and could see the light in the sky... when she got there  i told her that i could see nothing. we watch the sky for a few mins, like usual.  then we see what looks to be a plane coming with the landing lights one.  i dont pay it any attention, because im really assuming its a lane.  when it gets dirrectly over us... from under  the object.. we could see 3 triangle objects with  a red light at each corner. u couldnt see the bright light anymore, just 3 triangles in a row going across the sky.  we try to follow it to get a  good picture of it but they were moving to fast... as soon as we get back to the house about 30mins later.. we see 3 more of the same objects, but this time they were in a triangle pattern. they kinda looked like the phoenix lights going by.

we recent got hold of some binoculars. we really wanted to see what they looked like through them. so far we have only see the star like one... and they just look like balls of very bright light going across the sky. a perfectly round ball of intense white light ... that dimms when jets get near them..???
content.summary: Several events in feb.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello, i'm from brazil and do not speak english, i am using a translator for the district web.Moro itaipuau maric in the municipality of rio de janeiro state, some 40 km distant from the capital. 
since you live in place for 6 years now witnessing the sight of three or four unidentified flying objects and have some experience in amateur free-flight, the paraglider pilot am i very interested in aviation and meteorology, and so i know and identify an aircraft of some normal and some unusual weather phenomena. well, one of my past times is photography and i love storms and the night was taking pictures of the rays of a storm that drops about 20 km more or less, and after beating more than 100 photos with my canon powershot a620 was deleting the photos, discouraged because they were showing useless, had not even caught any radius. when i was almost giving up and deleting a photo everything seemed intriguing. three risks appeared in the photo, not delete and go running pro pc to see this picture better. 
the original photo is with resolution of 3024 x 2304. at the same time there ran out and was looking at the sky and the surrounding area looking for something that you can explain these effects in the photo, but nothing! 
after review, analyze and examine an explanation and can not now send the picture to several people to give them your opinion and nobody is in danger. 
yesterday watching the discovery saw the work of you and would like an opinion about this photo. 
at the time it hit the photos did not see anything different or heard anything unusual, only the rumble of distant lightning. 
  
thanks, [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Was taking pictures (over 100) of a storm and when i see the photos that appeared in one.

content.detailedDescription: This happened around 13 years ago, i was 8 at the time.  it was a monday night in either august or september.  it was between 8-8:30 pm (i remember this because i was in cub scouts at the time and the meetings ended around 8 on monday nights, and i remember school had just started back recently so it was either august or september).  i was riding home with my mother (she wants to remain anonymous and doesn't remember much she did give me permission to use her name but she doesn't want to be contacted) from my cub scout meeting we were less than a mile from our house when we rounded a curve when we saw it (i don't remember who spotted it first).  the object was shapped like a upside u with two large spotlights (it was these that drew our attention) on the bottom it also had numerous smaller red and green lights (like naviagation lights on aircraft), it was colored black or another dark color, it had no visible cockpit or propulsion system, and it was completely silent.  it was hovering less than 50 feet (if i had a baseball i could've hit it) above a field (this field is about 5 feet from the road on the right side so the object was almost directly overhead) that was about 10 - 15 yards long and it seemed to be about as wide as the field below it, i'd estimate the height of the object to be 10 - 15 feet.  it hovered there for about 2-2.5 minutes completely silent it then took off slowly at first but is started accelerating at a steady pace towards coats nc which is about a 2-3 miles west.  as it started to accelerate it started make an electrical humming that got louder as it sped up.  it took less than a minute for it to leave our sight.  during the time we saw it i wasn't afraid and i don't think my mother was either (she stopped the car in the middle of the road to look at it and she wouldn't have done that if she was frightened or concerned for our safety), i was curious about the object and so was my mother judging by her actions.  i remember looking for a camera and asking my mother if she had one with her, she said no.  i also asked if she knew what it was because i didn't, again she said no.  i didn't feel in danger at anytime during the sighting and now that i look back on it i get the impression it was surveying the area (don't ask how i get this impression because i don't know i just do).  after the object left me and my mother agreed not to tell my father because he would think we were crazy (when i finally told him several months later he treated me like child who says there's a monster under his bed).  for a long time i thought it was an experimental military aircraft (based on the lights that looked similiar to red and green naviagation lights and the fact that i live in between several large military bases) but i've thought more about it lately and i can't understand why the military would test an advanced and obviously secret experimental aircraft so early at night in such a densely populated area near 3 major roads and 2 interstates, then there's the lack of a visible cockpit (could have been on top) and propulsion system (i was close enough to it that it would have been impossible to miss and also because i got to see the front, left side, bottom, and back of the object) its beacuse of these things that i no longer think it was an experimental military (or civilian) aircraft, i don't know what it was.  i still remember the object like i saw it 30 seconds ago and i could draw a very good sketch of it (i would've done it for this but i don't know how to transfer sketches to my pc).  as an interesting sidenote after i saw this object i started taking an interest in ufos (i already an interest in military aircraft) and i began to read books on the subject of ufos and sightings of them to try and find out what it was (when i come across something i don't know i try to find out more about it).  i still don't know what it was but i know it'll stick with me for a long time.
content.summary: Something i saw as a kid.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
I can not smoke inside so i go out everytime i smoke and have never seen anything like this.  i live by kci airport and i was in the air force so i have seen airplanes, both civilian and military and i know what can and shouldn't be able to be done by our technology.

i was looking up and saw one moving item in the sky after being outside for no more than 20 seconds and i assumed it was an airplane so i looked away to find something else interesting to look at... i look back to the airplane moments later and then the main light which looks like a halogen airplane light blink off with no afterglow.  remaining is a green strobe light on the object, then within one minute after it staying in place it just shoots up into the sky and is gone within 2 seconds.  i was looking nw from my back porch to see this object.

worth note:  less than 5 minutes later there are several military planes flying around!!!

we are not alone!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Triangular craft with four lights

content.detailedDescription: I had gone outside to have a cigarette and as i began to light up i noticed in the sky a bright object. at first i thought it was a star but after closer examination i noticed that it was far too bright and that it was blinking rapidly in array of different colors (blue, red, yellow, green). it almost looked as if the object was moving side to side slightly, but i wasn't sure. there was another witness who was at first skeptical claiming that it was a helicopter, however even he was in awe of the sight. after a few moments it seemed to dim, almost disappearing all together. then it became bright again. the sighting lasted for thirty minutes until it seemed to fade out all together. throughout the whole time of watching the object i felt as if it was communicating somehow, or even surveying the area. i did have a camera with me at the time, but i wasn't able to get the object because it was so far away. that and the fact i couldn't turn the flash off the camera. i haven't uploaded the photo's to my computer but would be willing to hand over what photo's i do have. i had a very eerie feeling during and after the object faded away. the weirdest part, aside from the ufo sighting, was the military aircraft that has been flying around our parts in the past few weeks. earlier in the day i had seen a military helicopter flying low over the town of port neches. what i saw tonight was no star and nor was it a helicopter. there has been rumors of a secret military base in the area. this was not the first strange thing i have seen in this area, however this is the strangest of them all.
content.summary: Multi-colored ufo spotted in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I looked at the what looked like a planet thru nightvision and the ufo was pulsating. it is 10:26 pst and has been in the southern sky for some time now. stationary
content.summary: Orb like-twinkling-couple of colors.

content.detailedDescription:
March 16th, 2009 at 8:20pm i spotted a star like object moving from the southern area of the sky. it was moving north. it was amber to orange in color. it was above the clouds. it moved into the clouds and came out from behind the clouds moving ene direction and turned  to the ne and disappeared at a distance. i took a picture with my 35mm camera with 800asa film. camera lens zoomed at 105, aperture 4, speed 8. we will have to see if i get a picture? i will need to develop the film.

march 16th, 2009 at 8:40pm i spotted a star like object moving from the sw area towards me as it curved down then moved upward and leveled off moving ne. it was above the clouds and was amber to orange in color. at 8:48pm i saw a blue light defusing widely though the clouds. it was very fast and moving from north to south. at 9:10pm i saw a blue light once more quickly moving through the clouds in the same direction.
content.summary: Two sightings-round amber orange colored object moving over salt lake city valley.

content.detailedDescription: March 13th, 2009, i spotted one star like object moving from south to north. the color was amber to orange in color. it was on the west side of the valley. it passed my position in the valley and stopped. it was a little hazy out in spots. it was lost out of my view due to the trees in the backyard as it stopped, but i could not find it. as the day before they seem to light up as they move and get dim when they decide to stop and hover for a while. it was about 8:30pm? i stayed out to about 9:30 and didnt see anything else.
content.summary: Round star like object moving, then hovering, amber to orange in color.
